授業目的:
This
course is designed for business students and future leaders who want to
understand the link between sustainability issues and business activities. The
purpose of this course is to provide a practical understanding of marketing
within the broader context of business activities, economic, social, and
environmental issues. As the link between companies and consumers, marketing
plays a critical role in promoting sustainable consumption and production.
到達目標:
Students will
     develop a practical understanding of sustainability issues and their
     relation to businesses.
 Students will
     recognize the role of marketing in promoting and driving sustainability
     within an organization, with customers, and in society.
 Students will
     gain a practical understanding of sustainable marketing strategies and
     sustainable consumer behavior.
 Students will
     develop the ability to use AI tools responsibly and effectively in
     researching contemporary sustainable business issues.
 Students will
     rethink marketing principles and practices in a broader context that
     balances people, planet, and profit.
